description: Master precision and agility as you conquer the ice. Race against time and challenge friends worldwide with asynchronous multiplayer features. Compete against the ghosts of friends and top players in time trials, pushing your skills to the limit.

name: Neptune Island
description: Neptune Island is a short puzzle game where you have been tasked with repairing the light of a lighthouse. The light has been out for some time, and the owner hasn't done anything to fix it. Unbeknownst to you, you have a much more difficult job ahead of you than you anticipated...

name: Concentration
description: Enjoy the classic card game of concentration!

name: Monkeys & Typewriters!
description: Ever heard of those million chimps with a million typewriters writing the collected works of Shakespeare? Guess what, you're that monkey! Join Typo the Monkey in this rogue relax simulator which allows you to generate any type of story you can think of, explore and win it, and share it with others!

name: Sketchy Marathon
description: Platform in a world that's drawn for you! A 2D endless platformer game where you must evade obstacles drawn by a rogue pencil! Explore a variety of biomes while improving your high score and collecting hats along the way.

name: Tres
description: Tres is a cards-based game where you, with another player, have to compete againt each other to see wich one is the first to put on the table all of their cards.

name: A Work of Art
description: A dark, witty, psychological thriller in the horror genre, A Work of Art presents a 1-2 hour story-driven experience with Visual Novel features and RPG elements. Follow a colorful cast of quirky characters through a twisted tale of beauty and darkness; All to the sound of a Dark Original soundtrack.

name: Achilles: Survivor
description: Achilles: Survivor is a dynamic single-player bullet heaven game where you face thousands of enemies, build destructive structures, develop your character to return as an even more powerful machine of destruction and survive waves of enemies.

name: Records of the Flycatcher
description: The empire of Hadria has turned its war machine against the vulnerable eastern hinterlands of Altheim. With only your sniper rifle on your back, and a few strips of rabbit meat in your pocket, you must defend the motherland and wage a lone guriella war against the overwhelming tide of invaders.

name: Hallway of Horrors
description: Explore a mysterious labyrinth of rooms and hallways, but be careful - for you are not alone in the Hallway of Horrors. Made with Unreal Engine 5 for Steam VR.

name: Dashpunch
description: After the Tyrant Hand is stolen by a mysterious figure, an ancient being awakens to return it to its rightful place before it's too late. Dash and Punch your way through corrupted dungeons that fall apart at the seams, meet colorful characters, battle powerful bosses and carve your legacy!

name: Voodoo Dolls
description: Voodoo Dolls is a first person action shooter, where you need to escape the Witch's Spooky Castle. Fight through endless corridors in 90s style mazes and dungeons.

name: Homunculus
description: An auto-battle game where you create and upgrade a homunculus to gather materials for the Philosopher's Stone. Explore diverse realms, use your alchemy lab to create powerful augments and complete the magnum opus.

name: Casablanca: The Day After
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Reaper's Odyssey
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Trainee Death Simulator
description: You will play as a Trainee Death, harvesting Souls to pay off your debt. Random choice events offer you various options: Lie in bed and slack off since the debt is endless anyway, Or follow your senior to earn some extra Souls, collecting outfits to switch up your style.

name: Super Tax City
description: A new sensation!? City-building x Roguelike game, Super Tax City. Choose and place your favorite facilities from randomly drawn options! The combinations are endless! Create a profitable city that's uniquely yours!

name: Nova: Space Armada
description: An exceptional sci-fi strategy game based on space adventure as its core.

name: Bygg b√•tar med Mulle Meck: Specialversion
description:
This port is a customised version of the original sponsored by the Swedish company Hemglass.

Some items are already available, and the whole map is discovered from the beginning. As such the the pieces gotten from certain quests will be missing due to this. The compass part is missing and makes some areas compleletly inaccessible. A new icecream kiosk is added which is Hemglass branded.

Any extra downloadable content that was available form the developer's homepage do not work in this version.

name: Clockwork Rabbit
description: Tessa the bunny was hired at a textile factory as a mechanic. Create and program robots to solve logical puzzles.

name: Midnight Special

name: Delta
description: ‚àÜ is an atmospheric exploration experience that takes you on a journey through the dream world into the Beyond.

name: Playing God
description: Speedrun your way across the nine circles of hell through 100 levels in this ultra fast-paced precision platformer, rebelling against the mysterious entity playing god.

name: Heroes of Hammerwatch II
description: A rogue-lite that offers extensive persistent progression. Build your town, upgrade and equip your heroes, before taking on the the ever-changing Dark Citadel - either solo or with a team of friends.

name: Fate: Reawakened
description: Revisit the quaint town of Grove and the realms beyond as you prepare to enter the Dungeon Gate once again! The award-winning FATE series has gotten a modern facelift while remaining true to the nostalgic dungeon crawler classic.

name: Void Path
description: "Void Path" is a first-person horror game set in a residential area of ‚Äã‚ÄãJapan. There are no grotesque monsters. You explore a town depicted with retro-style graphics.

name: Aurora Defense
description: Construct and upgrade your base, train troops, and fend off enemy waves. Combine blessing effects to enhance forces and create tactical strategies. Each run offers fresh challenges for a unique experience.

name: Super Yoshi no Tamago
description: Cancelled remake of Yoshi (1991), seemingly started development some time before 1995 and undiscovered until 2024, where a DS port was discovered in the source code of Pokemon Black and White.

name: Guidus Zero
description: A real-time grid-based action roguelike game. Explore the sinkhole known as the "Scar" to search for spirits and treasure chests, and defeat the corrupted enemies and bosses as you strive to reach the deepest floor of the Scar, where the source of chaos awaits.

name: Cooking Madness
description: A cooking game with very different ingredients.

name: Present Party
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Astral Frontier
description: Change your fate in a world to the brink of extinction! A space fantasy RPG!

name: Port Town: Survival
description: A deserted port town, missing people, and a dark secret waiting to be uncovered‚Ä¶ Dive into Port Town‚Äôs open world, collect mysterious photos, and reveal the truth. But be careful‚Ä¶ some secrets are meant to stay buried.

name: Elio
description:
You can evolve your low-rarity Class Souls into higher-rarity Souls.
Discover your favorite classes and use them at every chance you get!
Special bonuses will occur when classes with certain traits are combined.
Use the right combinations and skills to beat even the toughest dungeons!

name: Mini Mini Golf Golf
description: An indie storytelling experience that goes beyond the lanes of the here and now into distant memories of a future planetary collapse. Destabilize the present and plunge into a neon psychohistory of a bizarre entity in distress. This is not a game about minigolf.

name: Wandering Monolith
description: You are the Wandering Monolith, falling from the sky. Summon towers, expand the board, defend your core, and build your deck of upgrades to conquer countless worlds.

name: Carnival Massacre
description: Drawing heavily from classic survival horror tropes, Carnival Massacre takes players on a haunting quest in a cursed theme park. Explore your surroundings, manage your messy inventory, solve puzzles and kill the four ringleaders of the park.

name: Newspaper Day
description: Take on the role of a newspaper delivery person in a seemingly quiet neighborhood. Every morning, you carry out your job, delivering the day's news to your neighbors' doors. However, you soon realize that things are not what they seem.

name: Cross Hearts Arcadia
description:
Researching an ancient ruin, Nirva hears a strange voice that leads him to an "egg" deep in the ruin which he takes home.
In time, that egg turns into a curious fairy.
The fairy named Tylt asks Nirva to travel to the Genesis Sanctuary together...
A fantasy RPG where you set off from the floating continent Nirva calls home with his mysterious fairy Tylt on an adventure to find the Genesis Sanctuary!

name: Knight Of The Earthends
description: A dynamic fantasy RPG, featuring an adventure around the ends of the earth. Enjoy the stirring energy of the battles and the quest.

name: Darkgate
description:
A long time ago, a battle ensued between God and the Demon Lord.
To resist the powerful Demon Lord, God created a human.
Sacrificing his own body to seal the Demon Lord, God assigned the role of guarding that seal to the chosen one.

name: Escape From Castle Orochi
description:
As the protagonist hired to guard the princess, you must enter Castle Orochi to save the abducted princess. No one has ever returned after entering this mysterious castle.
Solve the puzzles, overcome traps, and defeat all foes to save the princess and escape! Featuring also a high replay value with multiple endings, will you be able to experience each ending?!

name: Awaken Infinity
description: A top-down RPG with visual novel elements. Wake up in a futuristic room with no memory, and unravel the mysteries of your past.

name: Path of the Oxiflame
description: Path of the Oxiflame is a 3D sokoban-puzzle-adventure inspired by classic Team Ico games. It features multiple playable characters as well as numerous puzzle mechanics beyond the classic pushing of boxes.

name: Terrorbytes
description: 4-player co-op: Share resources in this TRON & Stranger Things inspired horror that focuses on team work mechanics. You and your friends are sucked into an arcade machine, and forced to gather pellets for a horrifically mangled retro-arcade hero.

name: Intergalactic Battle Roosters
description: It‚Äôs time to cluck around and find out. Gear up and pull on the helmets of the Battle Roosters, a hotshot space brigade of poultry with panache. In this quirky, roguelike, bullet hell adventure you‚Äôll combine weapons, upgrades and killer strategies to recover space‚Äôs best taco ingredients. Bwark!

name: Anode Heart: Layer Null
description: Isometric card battler RPG with a touch of virtual creatures, set in a futuristic, digital world, with over-the-top villains and a very shadowy plot.

name: Meng Jun Gan Si Dui
description: A top-view puzzle/action game that takes place in WWII. You play as a prisoner of war, trying to escape the camp. You must sneak around, and try not to get caught by the enemy.

name: Kawaii Neko Girls 2
description: Kawaii Neko Girls 2 - It's a relaxing anime puzzle game with cute kawaii hentai neko girls. Solve puzzles and collect all the pictures. Enjoy high quality artwork.

name: MWT: Tank Battles
description: Immerse yourself in intense tank battles featuring the most advanced war machines including air defense systems, multiple launch rocket systems, self-propelled artillery, various types of drones, fighters, helicopters & more. Experience the modern combined arms battles in the most spectacular way.

name: Artificial Nexus
description: Susan has woken up in a strange, coffin-like device, with no memory of who or where she is. Uncover the answers as you solve puzzles to escape the building in this sci-fi mystery investigation!

name: Tsugunohi: Supernatural Supermarket
description: The setting is a supermarket after closing hours!

name: Crash Puzzle Hammer-San
description:
A full-fledged action puzzle game with simple controls!
A massive 300 stages!
Includes an edit feature to create your own stages!

name: Astrobotanica
description: Discover Earth 300 thousand years ago as an alien biologist. Utilize your expertise in botany to survive, grow plants, harvest crops, compose and brew tonics. Reveal hidden powers of unknown plants. Engage with primal humans, leaving your mark on the future of civilization.

name: Booger Booster
description: A game created for the GBJAM (GameBoy Jam). Control a character that looks like a radio active booger and try to find the exit to the maze, to confront a boss and complete the game.

name: Out of Touch!
description:
Out of Touch is a captivating story of friendship, trauma, and healing.

At its heart is our hero CJ, who reunites with his childhood friends after years apart for their final semesters of high school.

Unbeknownst to them, ancient entities, unfathomably old and with inscrutable motives, lurk in the shadows and threaten to take control of the group and their latent powers.

name: Brain Drain
description:
Brain Drain is a little cute-em-up with four zones in a long single level.

Each zone ends with it's own boss.

Get hit once and die.

name: RAWR: Little Hungry Dragon
description: RAWR is a little dragon STG made in 9 days for the #GBJam.

name: Dog Walking Adventures
description: Dog Walking Adventures invites players into a cozy casual experience where the simple joys of walking with a canine companion become an adventure in itself. Walk around and explore immersive environments, all while playing with your dog, completing quests and collecting items.

name: Second Stellar
description:
Follow Asphodene and Eridani on their star-spanning adventure to portend the mysteries of their existence. Actively wield myriad weapons and their abilities in symphony to defeat those who would bar your path. Throughout your journey, court intriguing and vibrant passengers as you venture beyond the stars above.

This adventure won't be easy- Hordes of foes will stand in your way, and you must answer their challenge to progress. Emerging triumphant against these foes will reward experience, catalyzed into unique items and upgrades to bolster your offense.

name: Back Light
description: Back Light was made for the Game Boy Jam in about 4 days. In Back Light you play a kid up way past their bed time. You just want to play your game boy but this is before hand held gaming had back lights. So to increase you happy meter and score stand under a lit lamp. Make sure to keep your happy meter up and avoid your Mom to try and get the highest score!

name: Of Lies and Rain
description: Of Lies and Rain is a story-driven first person shooter built exclusively for VR. Set in a dark, sci-fi, post-apocalyptic world, at the edge of the real and digital realm. You‚Äôll fight to reclaim your past and save humanity from the brink of extinction.

name: Gynotai
description: First arcade game of the Almighty Human Project series. This is a simple game where you push 3 balls.

name: Techno Drive
description: Techno Drive is an arcade driving game that focuses on technical driving skills rather than speed. Players are tasked with completing a series of driving challenges designed to test precision, control, and reaction time. The game is notable for its futuristic, minimalist visual style with flat-shaded polygons and a techno soundtrack that complements its high-tech theme.

name: Vetitum_VRC
description: Explore all the video tapes about the forest and the paranormal activities that happen, discover all the secrets by controlling who records these videos in a first person experience. Do not watch the video too many times, there is something strange about it.

name: Creepy Shift: Roadside Diner
description: A broke young man takes on the night shift at a roadside diner. In the glow of the blood moon, routine tasks turn into a fight for survival. First-person horror based on a dark creepypasta with a set of rescue rules.

name: Uncle Chuck Incorporated
description: In 2005, the robotics entertainment company Uncle Chuck Inc. mysteriously declared bankruptcy. As an investigator, your mission is to infiltrate their abandoned headquarters, solve puzzles, and find a hidden VHS tape revealing the truth, all while evading the dangerous animatronic characters.

name: Chicken vs. Road
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Chroma
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Moonfrost
description: Moonfrost is an isometric, next-gen pixel art, lo-fi multiplayer life-sim set in a fantasy version of the modern day that offers a premium experience but as a free-to-play game.

name: PlayHex
description: A connection game where the single rule is that you must connect your sides.

name: Fantasy Aquarium
description: Fantasy Aquarium offers an effortless way to enhance your gaming experience. You can nurture a diverse range of small fish with unique characteristics and construct a vibrant fantasy world from scratch, transforming mundane fish-keeping into an engaging pursuit.

name: Incremental Dice
description: Chill incremental game about dice making money. Upgrade your dice to make more money, to upgrade your dice to make even more money!

name: Pit of Gerstan
description: Pit of Gerstan is a roguelite dungeon-massacring action game. Hack, slash, throw and blast your way through hordes of enemies and bosses, as you collect various items, upgrades and weapons to create the ultimate dungeon-clearing hero.

name: Pop It!
description:
Pop It! is an arcade game that consists of exploding the entire batch of vertical balloons with a single shot.

As you explode them, more will appear and it will become increasingly difficult for you to be at the top of the leaderboard!

name: Ragdoll Training Center
description:
Ragdoll Training Center is a physics based arcade game where you push a ragdoll character through the challenging maps to reach the finish.
Compete for thousandths of a second differences with other players in global ranking.
Create your own maps in Map Editor and try maps made by other players.

name: Retail Mage
description: Welcome, Retail Mage, to your first day of employment at MageMart! Get 5 star reviews from customers before the store closes. Say and do (almost) anything in this open-ended, creative co-op game!

name: Willy Byte in the Digital Dimension
description: You are Willy Byte and transport bytes of information from the keyboard to the disk drive.

name: Yoku aru Dasshutsu Game
description: Yoku aru Dasshutsu Game, also commonly referred to as "Dona Room" or "Dona's Room" in the West, is the first game in a series of escape games by Naoki Nakashima.

name: Sports Girl: Village
description: Lucy is a sporty girl, this time she comes to a deserted village, in order to obtain the ancient magic, restore the girls who have been petrified by the spell, she needs to find 18 objects to make magic. There are 24 beautiful girls waiting to be rescued.

name: Obsolete: After the Accident
description: Obsolete: After the Accident, centers around a young girl who experienced a serious traumatic event, which ended in the death of her father leading to her exploring a broken pizzeria and having to survive 3 broken down animatrics

name: Lovish
description: Lovish is an outrageous 8-bit action-adventure game! Quest with Sir Solomon through a series of bite-sized rooms, as he attempts to free Princess Tsuna, the woman he loves, from the Devil Lord's clutches!

name: Extremely Common Game of Escape
description: Very Ordinary Escape Game: Look for the Usual Shelf!, also commonly referred to as "Dona Room 2" or "Dona's Room 2" in the West, is the second game in a series of escape games by Naoki Nakashima.

name: Monster Lover 2: Ambrosilas
description: He's a Failure of a Yakuza. He's an Arcane Murder Genie - Can They Find Love? Our main character has been a screw-up his entire life. That's what led him to the Yakuza. He needs help, and summons Ambrosilas. But this sexy murder genie doesn't like helping criminals!

name: Croak Crusader: Spawn of the Spore Spectre
description: Croak Crusader: Spawn of the Spore Spectre is a 2D action platformer with a real focus on speed, Tarantino-style violence, and a wicked grapple feature that lets ya zip around like an acrobat, eh! This is a prequel chapter for Croak Crusader: the Champion of Canada, and the full game‚Äôs gonna have, like, five times the content of this demo, buddy! So buckle up, ‚Äòcause you‚Äôre in for a wild one, don‚Äôtcha know!

name: BMPES
description: BMPES is a Brazilian mod for PES 2021 that adds a bunch of content like teams, stadiums, competitions, etc. In addition to updating the player roster quite frequently.

name: Sand: A Leo Parker Adventure
description: Sand is part puzzle game, part adventure, part graphic novel. Unravel the story of the long-dead Pharaoh Anat as you solve puzzles and discover clues across a variety of Egypt-themed settings. Delve tombs, trace clues in the stars themselves, haggle with merchants, unlock ancient doors and journey back to ancient Egypt itself in search of answers.

name: Silk: A Leo Parker Adventure
description: Silk is part puzzle game, part adventure, part graphic novel. Search Sir Francis‚Äô home for clues, meet diverse characters, retrace Sir Francis‚Äô steps and locate the ancient palace of a long dead Ming empress. Silk is by far our biggest adventure yet!

name: .Redrum
description: .redruM is a psychological horror game blending realism and visual experimentation. Inspired by liminal spaces, backrooms, and real crime scenes, you play as a photographer uncovering the identity behind gruesome murders. .redruM is the red room where unshared photos are developed.

name: The Patient
description: Dr. Ellen Reed returns to work as a therapist only to discover an inpatient has been mistakenly dosed with a deadly mutative drug. With hospital records erased due to a power outage, she must work overnight to identify and discreetly euthanize the affected patient before it's too late.

name: Intelligent Strategy Games Volume 1
description:
A collection of classical board games which includes:

- Backgammon
- Draughts
- Gomoku
- Chinese Chess
- Bridge

name: Intelligent Strategy Games Volume 2
description:
A collection of board games including:

- Renju
- Reversi (mis-labeled as Othello on the box)
- Chess
- Four-in-a-Line
- Go

name: Cigo
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: The Ghost of Redstone Manor
description: A first-person mystery game with puzzles and story-rich dialogue. Explore a 3D environment with original art, character design, and a distinct cartoon-y style. Investigate your own murder through branching conversations and a unique possession mechanic. Featuring original music by Svetlana Rudenko.

name: Dungeon Gore: Lost Treasury
description: Dungeon Gore is a FPS, strategy, and stealth horror game where you explore the dungeon and collect enough ancient treasure and escape with your findings.

name: Lost Shadows
description: A cooperative survival horror for up to 5 players. Explore procedural abandoned mines, terrifying creatures and work together to prevent a looming global catastrophe.

name: Requiem For a Lost World
description: Requiem For a Lost World is a singleplayer/co-op roguelite bullet-hell game combining the fun of destroying thousands of enemies with unique builds and a pleasing stylized anime graphics. Unlock new characters, collect powerful weapons and create synergies with elemental reactions!

name: Rusty the Rooster
description: "Rusty the Rooster" is a captivating 2D pixel art platformer where players join Rusty, a brave rooster, on a heroic quest to rescue his girlfriend and unborn chicks. With its charming graphics and heartwarming storyline, this game offers an unforgettable adventure of courage and love.
